search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Customer.io (customerio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Customer.io is available at: [https://customer.io/pricing](https://customer.io/pricing)【3:0†source】.

100

per month / billed monthly for

For small companies who are gaining momentum

[Get startedGet started](https://fly.customer.io/signup)

Features you'll love:

*   **2** object types
    
*   Email and community support
    
*   Ad audience sync
    
*   Visual workflow builder
    
*   **Data Pipelines** basic integrations
    

Premium

starts at

$

1,000

per month / billed yearly

For companies who are growing rapidly

[Book a demoBook a demo](https://customer.io/demo)

Everything in Essentials, plus:

*   **Custom** profile volume & pricing
    
*   **Custom** email volume & pricing
    
*   **10** object types
    
*   Premium chat & email support
    
*   90-day onboarding support
    
*   HIPAA Compliance
    
*   **Data Pipelines** premium integrations
    

Enterprise

 Let's talk

 

For companies who are scaling globally

[Talk to salesTalk to sales](https://customer.io/demo)

Everything in Premium, plus:

*   Our best pricing on profile & email volume
    
*   Priority technical support
    
*   Migration support\*
    
*   Dedicated Customer Success Manager\*
    
*   Dedicated hardware
    
*   Audit logging & data governance
    

**Trusted by 7,800+ brands around the world** to send data powered communication each day
